component.name: Pipoca
component.summary: AI-powered subtitle translation using local Ollama models

description.p: Pipoca is a modern, privacy-focused subtitle translation application that leverages local AI models through Ollama. Translate your subtitle files (.srt) to over 20 languages using powerful language models running entirely on your computer.
Prerequisites: Ollama must be installed and running locally to use Pipoca. Pipoca connects to the local Ollama HTTP API at 127.0.0.1:11434. No data is sent to remote servers.

ul.li: Local AI Processing: All translations happen on your machine using Ollama models
Multi-language Support: Translate to 20+ popular languages with flag emojis
Smart Model Selection: Built-in recommendations for translation-optimized models
Drag & Drop: Easy file selection with visual feedback
Real-time Progress: Track translation progress with GNOME HIG-compliant progress bars
Privacy First: No data leaves your computer
Portal-Only File Access: Uses sandbox-friendly file open/save via portals
Modern UI: Beautiful Libadwaita interface following GNOME design principles

description.p: Perfect for: Content creators, language learners, accessibility improvements, and anyone who needs to translate subtitle files while maintaining complete privacy and control over their data.
